languages.text: "Почему бы вам не присесть? Я с удовольствием уделю вашему визиту больше времени".

traits.locale_text: "Почему бы вам не присесть? Я с удовольствием уделю вашему визиту больше времени".

languages.text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."
languages.original_text: "Почему бы вам не присесть? Я с удовольствием уделю вашему визиту больше времени".

traits.locale_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."
"Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."
"Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."
"Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

languages.text: “不如你坐下来吧？我很愿意多花点时间和你聊聊。”
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

traits.locale_text: “不如你坐下来吧？我很愿意多花点时间和你聊聊。”

languages.text: «¿Por qué no se sienta? Me encantaría poder dedicar más tiempo a su visita».
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué no se sienta? Me encantaría poder dedicar más tiempo a su visita».

languages.text: 「座らないか？もう少し話ができれば幸いだ」
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

traits.locale_text: 「座らないか？もう少し話ができれば幸いだ」

languages.text: « Asseyez-vous donc. Je me ferais un plaisir de vous accorder plus de temps. »
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

traits.locale_text: « Asseyez-vous donc. Je me ferais un plaisir de vous accorder plus de temps. »

languages.text: "Warum setzt Ihr Euch nicht? Es würde mich freuen, Euch bei Eurem Besuch mehr Zeit zu widmen."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."

traits.locale_text: "Warum setzt Ihr Euch nicht? Es würde mich freuen, Euch bei Eurem Besuch mehr Zeit zu widmen."

languages.text: "Neden oturmuyorsun? Ziyaretine memnuniyetle daha fazla vakit ayırabilirim."
languages.original_text: "Why don't you sit down? I would be pleased to devote more time to your visit."
